languages.text: "Это бесполезная команда, Вольный Торговец, потому что кибермастиф всегда должен находиться в позиции, из которой эффективнее всего атаковать врага. Глейто может ползти или двигаться скрытно, если требует ситуация, но в любом случае он не отреагирует на приказ постороннего человека".

"That is a useless command, Rogue Trader. A cyber-mastiff must always be in an advantageous position to attack the enemy. Glaito can crawl or move stealthily if the situation calls for it, but, regardless, he will not respond to someone else's order."
languages.original_text: "Это бесполезная команда, Вольный Торговец, потому что кибермастиф всегда должен находиться в позиции, из которой эффективнее всего атаковать врага. Глейто может ползти или двигаться скрытно, если требует ситуация, но в любом случае он не отреагирует на приказ постороннего человека".

traits.locale_text: "That is a useless command, Rogue Trader, because a cyber-mastiff must always be in an advantageous position to attack the enemy. Glaito can crawl or move stealthily if the situation calls for it, but, regardless, he will not respond to someone else's order."

"That is a useless command, Rogue Trader, because a cyber-mastiff must always be in an advantageous position to attack the enemy. Glaito can crawl or move stealthily if the situation calls for it, but, regardless, he will not respond to someone else's order."

"That is a useless command, Rogue Trader. A cyber-mastiff must always be in an advantageous position to attack the enemy. Glaito can crawl or move stealthily if the situation calls for it, but, regardless, he will not respond to someone else's order."

languages.text: 「それは無意味なコマンドです、ローグトレーダー。サイバーマスチフは常に、敵を攻撃するのに有利な位置にいなければなりません。グライトは状況に応じて這ったり、忍び足で動くこともできますが、いずれにせよ、他人の命令には従いません」
languages.original_text: "That is a useless command, Rogue Trader. A cyber-mastiff must always be in an advantageous position to attack the enemy. Glaito can crawl or move stealthily if the situation calls for it, but, regardless, he will not respond to someone else's order."

traits.locale_text: 「それは無意味なコマンドです、ローグトレーダー。サイバーマスチフは常に、敵を攻撃するのに有利な位置にいなければなりません。グライトは状況に応じて這ったり、忍び足で動くこともできますが、いずれにせよ、他人の命令には従いません」

languages.text: "Das ist ein sinnloser Befehl, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ein Cyber-Mastiff muss sich immer in einer für einen Angriff auf den Feind vorteilhaften Position befinden. Glaito kann kriechen oder schleichen, falls die Situation es erfordert, würde aber davon abgesehen ohnehin nicht auf den Befehl von jemand anderem hören."
languages.original_text: "That is a useless command, Rogue Trader. A cyber-mastiff must always be in an advantageous position to attack the enemy. Glaito can crawl or move stealthily if the situation calls for it, but, regardless, he will not respond to someone else's order."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist ein sinnloser Befehl, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ein Cyber-Mastiff muss sich immer in einer für einen Angriff auf den Feind vorteilhaften Position befinden. Glaito kann kriechen oder schleichen, falls die Situation es erfordert, würde aber davon abgesehen ohnehin nicht auf den Befehl von jemand anderem hören."

languages.text: « Cet ordre est inutile, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Un cyber-mastiff se doit d'être toujours en position avantageuse pour attaquer un ennemi. Glaito sait cependant ramper ou se déplacer furtivement si nécessaire. Mais dans tous les cas, il n'acceptera aucun ordre émanant d'une autre personne que moi. »
languages.original_text: "That is a useless command, Rogue Trader. A cyber-mastiff must always be in an advantageous position to attack the enemy. Glaito can crawl or move stealthily if the situation calls for it, but, regardless, he will not respond to someone else's order."

traits.locale_text: « Cet ordre est inutile, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Un cyber-mastiff se doit d'être toujours en position avantageuse pour attaquer un ennemi. Glaito sait cependant ramper ou se déplacer furtivement si nécessaire. Mais dans tous les cas, il n'acceptera aucun ordre émanant d'une autre personne que moi. »

languages.text: «Esa orden no sirve para nada, Comerciante Independiente. Un cibermastín siempre debe hallarse en posición ventajosa para atacar al enemigo. Glaito puede agazaparse o deslizarse en silencio cuando la situación lo requiere, pero en ningún caso obedecería una orden ajena».
languages.original_text: "That is a useless command, Rogue Trader. A cyber-mastiff must always be in an advantageous position to attack the enemy. Glaito can crawl or move stealthily if the situation calls for it, but, regardless, he will not respond to someone else's order."

traits.locale_text: «Esa orden no sirve para nada, Comerciante Independiente. Un cibermastín siempre debe hallarse en posición ventajosa para atacar al enemigo. Glaito puede agazaparse o deslizarse en silencio cuando la situación lo requiere, pero en ningún caso obedecería una orden ajena».

languages.text: “这个命令是无法生效的，行商浪人。生化獒犬必须始终处于适合攻击的有利位置。如果情况需要，格雷托可以爬开或匿踪移动，但无论如何，它都不会听从其他人的命令。”
languages.original_text: "That is a useless command, Rogue Trader. A cyber-mastiff must always be in an advantageous position to attack the enemy. Glaito can crawl or move stealthily if the situation calls for it, but, regardless, he will not respond to someone else's order."

traits.locale_text: “这个命令是无法生效的，行商浪人。生化獒犬必须始终处于适合攻击的有利位置。如果情况需要，格雷托可以爬开或匿踪移动，但无论如何，它都不会听从其他人的命令。”

languages.text: "Bu komut hiçbir işe yaramaz Hür Tacir. Siber mastifler, düşmana saldırmak için her zaman avantajlı bir konumda olmalıdır. Durum gerektirdiği takdirde Glatio sürünebilir veya gizlice hareket edebilir. Ancak başka birinin emrine asla yanıt vermez."
languages.original_text: "That is a useless command, Rogue Trader. A cyber-mastiff must always be in an advantageous position to attack the enemy. Glaito can crawl or move stealthily if the situation calls for it, but, regardless, he will not respond to someone else's order."

traits.locale_text: "Bu komut hiçbir işe yaramaz Hür Tacir. Bir siber mastif düşmana saldırmak için her zaman avantajlı bir konumda olmalıdır. Durum gerektirdiği takdirde Glatio sürünebilir veya gizlice hareket edebilir ama ne olursa olsun, başka birinin emrine asla yanıt vermez."

languages.original_text: "That is a useless command, Rogue Trader. A cyber-mastiff must always be in an advantageous position to attack the enemy. Glaito can crawl or move stealthily if the situation calls for it, but, regardless, he will not respond to someone else's order."
